name: Okinawa Rush: Black Mantis Edition
storyline:
The Black Mantis clan has come to Okinawa…
Play as a martial-arts master and take on the role of Hiro, Meilin, or Shin as they face hordes of ninja, demons and more in a desperate fight for their lives against the Black Mantis clan.
Bring a friend to the fray in local 2 player co-op and double the mayhem in this platforming, action adventure set in a mystical, fantasy version of Okinawa.
Fast, fluid combat-engine gives you many moves, combos, juggles and an intuitive parrying system.
summary:
Okinawa Rush is a martial arts platforming game with RPG elements, many items to collect and unique FengShui system.

Okinawa Rush: Black Mantis Edition contents:
- PS4 Game: Okinawa Rush
- FuturePak FuturePak (Metal box) with specific numbering
- 3 x Plastic cards
- Mantis USB Key: OST
- 5 x Energy crystals
- 4 x Artworks
